The Mach port used by the receiver. Cast this value to a mach_port_t when using it with Mach system calls.

# machPort

**Instance Property**

The Mach port used by the receiver, represented as an integer.

## Declaration

```swift
var machPort: UInt32 { get }
```

## Discussion

The Mach port used by the receiver. Cast this value to a mach_port_t when using it with Mach system calls.
title: machPort
